description: In the first set of GOP debates last month, former Hewlett-Packard CEO Carly Fiorina stood out as the clear winner of the “JV debate.” Buoyed by a bounce in the polls (and some lobbying of debate broadcaster CNN), she was on the main stage on Wednesday night, and pulled off the same feat again. Fiorina was the clear victor, while others who needed a win left their supporters at least as or more worried than when the night began. Within her performance, though, were hints of the weaknesses that will plague her for the rest of her campaign.Read full article >>
title: Post Partisan: Carly Fiorina scores big, but hints at her weakness
